Content:: Kaze, Slow Down (風、スローダウン) is a 1991 Japanese film directed by Shinsuke Shimada. It was chosen as the 7th Best Film at the 13th Yokohama Film Festival.[1]  This article related to a Japanese film of the 1990s is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
